extension.name: Horme_3_pro
extension.author: Spyros Petrakis
extension.description:
Horme 3 PRO - A fully bootstraped Joomla! 3 and VirtueMart 3 template.

  • Bootstrap 3.3.6
  • Mobile optimized
  • Fast loading

Support

  • Forum
  • Documentation
  • hermes@olympianthemes.com

field.name: lazy
field.label: Image Lazyload
field.description: Enables the lazy load of product images in categories and front page.

field.name: zoom
field.label: Product image zoom
field.description: Enables the zoom effect of product images in product details page.

field.name: sticky
field.label: Sticky menu
field.description: Enables the sticky menu behavior of the main menu.

field.name: background
field.label: Body background image
field.description: Select or upload a background image

field.name: slide1
field.label: Slide image
field.description: Select or upload a slide image

field.name: slide2
field.label: Slide image
field.description: Select or upload a slide image

field.name: slide3
field.label: Slide image
field.description: Select or upload a slide image

field.name: slide4
field.label: Slide image
field.description: Select or upload a slide image

field.name: slide5
field.label: Slide image
field.description: Select or upload a slide image

field.name: mobile
field.label: Select Mobile Devices
field.description: Select the mobile devices that the modules will not display for faster loading.
